articles.title: Pakistan end Rauf's contract for Australia tour refusal
articles.description: The Pakistan Cricket Board terminates fast bowler Haris Rauf's central contract after he refused to go on the Test tour of Australia.
articles.content:
Haris Rauf has played one Test, 37 one-day internationals and 66 T20s for Pakistan

articles.author: James Dampney
articles.title: Controversy mars skipper’s shock dismissal
articles.description: In a historic occasion at the WACA Ground in Perth, the Australian women’s team landed all the big blows in an impressive day of Test cricket against South Africa.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
